name: Shuriken Training
description: You are trained in the use of shuriken (small throwing blades), a special weapon type. When you use an action to attack with a shuriken weapon, you can attack foes within short range as a normal ranged attack or within medium range, ill-favored.

improvements.name: Long Throw
improvements.description: You may spend a half action and 1 MP to target a foe within medium range without the ill-favored penalty, or a foe within long range with the ill-favored penalty.

improvements.name: Pinning Throw
improvements.description: Each time you roll max damage on a damage die for your shuriken, if the foe is adjacent to a wall or other sturdy, inanimate object, they are pinned to that object and must spend a half action on their turn to free themselves (multiple pinnings require multiple half actions).

improvements.name: Piercing Throw
improvements.description: Each time you roll max damage on a damage die for your shuriken, you inflict 1 injury on the foe.
